participant_1.background:
I once got to meet a real unicorn in the forest near my house.
its cold where i live.
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
i was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
i like to cook new recipes.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my ability to cook vegan food that even meat-eaters would love.
our class is planning a trip to japan.
I will be considerate of others by keeping my music down and not disturbing them.
i have six brothers.
I am content with my simple life, but I do miss the occasional social interaction.

content.text: Not much, just thinking about the trip to japan.
Are you going to eat any traditional food there?
I will definitely try some traditional vegan food, I love to cook.
I have to say I am a meat eater, but vegan food can be really good.
I know, it's so hard to believe it's not meat, right?
I know! I have a friend who is vegan and I never would have guessed it if she didn't tell me.
Well, you're welcome! I'm sure you're a great cook.
Thanks! I do try my best.
What do you like to cook?
I like to try new recipes, but my go-to is usually vegan chili.
That sounds delicious! I love chili.
I'm glad! Maybe I'll make some for you next time we hang out.
That would be awesome! I'll bring the beer.
